welcome_message_body: Welcome to North Saanich, Canada! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and stunning natural beauty, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Victoria International Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is primarily used for general aviation and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springbank Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport caters to private and corporate flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Duncan/Quam Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friday Harbor Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orcas Island Airport offers a comfortable waiting area and a small gift shop for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and chartered flights, there is a separate terminal with a lounge and concierge services available.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
